checkEndgame(uint256,uint32,uint32).details: Checks the endgame state and determines whether the last user is checkmate'd or stalemate'd, or neither.

params.gameState: Game state from which start the movements

returns._0: outcome can be 0 for inconclusive/only check, 1 stalemate, 2 checkmate

checkGame(uint256,uint32,uint32,bool,uin.details: Calculates the outcome of a game depending on the moves from a starting position. Reverts when an invalid move is found.

params.moves: is the input array containing all the moves in the game
params.startingGameState: Game state from which start the movements
params.startingOpponentState: State of the other playing player
params.startingPlayerState: State of the first playing player
params.startingTurnBlack: Whether the starting player is the black pieces

returns.outcome: can be 0 for inconclusive, 1 for draw, 2 for white winning, 3 for black winning

commitMove(uint256,uint8,uint8).details: Commits a move into the game state. Validity of the move is not checked.

params.fromPos: is the position to move a piece from.
params.toPos: is the position to move a piece to.

getInBetweenMask(uint8,uint8).details: Gets the mask of the in-between squares. Basically it performs bit-shifts depending on the movement. Down: >> 8 Up: << 8 Right: << 1 Left: >> 1 UpRight: << 9 DownLeft: >> 9 DownRight: >> 7 UpLeft: << 7 Reverts for invalid movement.

returns._0: mask of the in-between squares, can be bit-wise-and with the game state to check squares

getPositionMask(uint8).details: Gets the mask (0xF) of a square

pieceAtPosition(uint256,uint8).details: Gets the piece at a given position in the current gameState. Behavior is undefined for position values greater than 0x3f

params.pos: is the position to get the piece: 6-bit var, 3-bit word, high word = row, low word = column.

searchPiece(uint256,uint32,uint32,uint8,.details: Performs one iteration of recursive search for pieces.

params.gameState: Game state from which start the movements

returns._0: returns true if any of the pieces in the current offest has legal moves

setPosition(uint256,uint8,uint8).details: Sets a piece position in the current game state. Behavior is undefined for position values greater than 0x3f

params.pos: is the position to set the piece: 6-bit var, 3-bit word, high word = row, low word = column.

verifyExecuteBishopMove(uint256,uint8,ui.details: Calculates the outcome of a single move of a bishop given the current game state. Returns invalid_move_constant for invalid movement.

params.gameState: current game state on which to perform the movement.

returns._0: newGameState the new game state after it's executed.

verifyExecuteKingMove(uint256,uint8,uint.details: Calculates the outcome of a single move of the king given the current game state. Returns invalid_move_constant for invalid movement.

params.fromPos: is position moving from. Behavior is undefined for values >= 0x40.
params.gameState: current game state on which to perform the movement.
params.toPos: is position moving to. Behavior is undefined for values >= 0x40.

returns.newGameState: the new game state after it's executed.

verifyExecuteKnightMove(uint256,uint8,ui.details: Calculates the outcome of a single move of a knight given the current game state. Returns invalid_move_constant for invalid movement.

params.gameState: current game state on which to perform the movement.

returns._0: newGameState the new game state after it's executed.

verifyExecuteMove(uint256,uint16,uint32,.details: Calculates the outcome of a single move given the current game state. Reverts for invalid movement.

params.gameState: current game state on which to perform the movement.
params.move: is the move to execute: 16-bit var, high word = from pos, low word = to pos move can also be: resign, request draw, accept draw.

returns.newGameState: the new game state after it's executed.

verifyExecutePawnMove(uint256,uint8,uint.details: Calculates the outcome of a single move of a pawn given the current game state. Returns invalid_move_constant for invalid movement.

params.gameState: current game state on which to perform the movement.

returns.newGameState: the new game state after it's executed.

verifyExecuteQueenMove(uint256,uint8,uin.details: Calculates the outcome of a single move of the queen given the current game state. Returns invalid_move_constant for invalid movement.

params.gameState: current game state on which to perform the movement.

returns._0: newGameState the new game state after it's executed.

verifyExecuteRookMove(uint256,uint8,uint.details: Calculates the outcome of a single move of a rook given the current game state. Returns invalid_move_constant for invalid movement.

params.gameState: current game state on which to perform the movement.

returns._0: newGameState the new game state after it's executed.

zeroPosition(uint256,uint8).details: Zeroes out a piece position in the current game state. Behavior is undefined for position values greater than 0x3f

params.pos: is the position to zero out: 6-bit var, 3-bit word, high word = row, low word = column.
